name: Sorry, I'm dead

trigger.text: Return up to one cost 8 or less character to its owner's hand.

text:
[Counter] Reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card has a cost of 4 or greater, return up to one of your characters to your hand. Then, place the revealed card on the bottom of your deck.
[Trigger] Return up to one cost 8 or less character to its owner's hand.
